name: google-calendar
label: Google Calendar
description: Google Calendar is a web-based calendar service developed by Google, allowing users to organize their schedules, appointments, and events seamlessly. It offers a range of features designed to help users manage their time effectively, collaborate with others, and stay organized across various devices.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Unique Client ID of the Google Calendar that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Calendar API.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client ID of the Google Calendar that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Calendar API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Unique Client Secret of the Google Calendar that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the client secret, see https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2/web-server.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client Secret of the Google Calendar that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Authorization Code
fields.name: code
fields.tooltip: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Calendar API section.
fields.description: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Calendar API section.

fields.title: Redirect URL
fields.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
fields.name: redirect_url
fields.tooltip: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get All Calendar List
operations.description: Retrieves the calendars on the user's calendar list from Google Calendar based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Minimum Access Role
parameters.name: minAccessRole
parameters.description: Specify the minimum access role for the user in the returned entries. The default is no restriction. You can choose from the following options: Free/Busy Reader, Owner, Reader, or Writer.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the minimum access role for the user in the returned entries. The default is no restriction. You can choose from the following options: Free/Busy Reader, Owner, Reader, or Writer.

parameters.title: Include Deleted Calendar
parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted calendar list entries in the result. By default, this option is set as False.
parameters.tooltip: Whether to include deleted calendar list entries in the result. By default, this option is set as False.

parameters.title: Show Hidden Calendar
parameters.name: showHidden
parameters.description: Whether to show hidden entries. By default, this option is set as False.
parameters.tooltip: Whether to show hidden entries. By default, this option is set as False.

parameters.title: Maximum Results
parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of entries returned on one result page. By default the value is 100 entries. The page size can never be larger than 250 entries.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of entries returned on one result page. By default the value is 100 entries. The page size can never be larger than 250 entries.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.description: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.title: Sync Token
parameters.description: Specify a Sync Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextSyncToken element, the value of the nextSyncToken element includes a Sync Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. Note: Minimum Access Role parameter cannot be specified together with Sync Token. By default, this is to return all entries.
parameters.name: syncToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Sync Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextSyncToken element, the value of the nextSyncToken element includes a Sync Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. Note: Minimum Access Role parameter cannot be specified together with Sync Token. By default, this is to return all entries.

operations.title: Get Calendar List Details
operations.description: Retrieves a calendar from the user's calendar list from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve calendar details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve calendar details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

operations.title: Delete Calendar List
operations.description: Removes a calendar from the user's calendar list from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to delete calendar details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to delete calendar details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

operations.title: Get Calendar Access Control List
operations.description: Retrieves the rules in the access control list for the calendar from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve rules in the access control list from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve rules in the access control list from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

parameters.title: Include Deleted Access Control List (ACL)
parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted ACLs in the result. Deleted ACLs are represented by role equal to "none". Deleted ACLs will always be included if sync Token is provided. By default, this option is set as False.
parameters.tooltip: Whether to include deleted ACLs in the result. Deleted ACLs are represented by role equal to "none". Deleted ACLs will always be included if sync Token is provided. By default, this option is set as False.

parameters.title: Maximum Results
parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of entries returned on one result page. By default the value is 100 entries. The page size can never be larger than 250 entries.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of entries returned on one result page. By default the value is 100 entries. The page size can never be larger than 250 entries.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.description: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.title: Sync Token
parameters.description: Specify a Sync Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextSyncToken element, the value of the nextSyncToken element includes a Sync Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. By default, this is to return all entries.
parameters.name: syncToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Sync Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextSyncToken element, the value of the nextSyncToken element includes a Sync Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. By default, this is to return all entries.

operations.title: Get Access Control Rule Details
operations.description: Retrieves an access control rule from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID and rule ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve access control rule details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve access control rule details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

parameters.title: Rule ID
parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the access control list (ACL) rule based on which you want to retrieve access control rule details from Google Calendar.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the access control list (ACL) rule based on which you want to retrieve access control rule details from Google Calendar.

operations.title: Delete Access Control Rule
operations.description: Deletes an access control rule from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID and rule ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to delete access control rule details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to delete access control rule details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

parameters.title: Rule ID
parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the access control list (ACL) rule based on which you want to delete access control rule details from Google Calendar.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the access control list (ACL) rule based on which you want to delete access control rule details from Google Calendar.

operations.title: Get Events List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of events on the specified calendar from Google Calendar based on the calendar ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve events from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve events from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

parameters.title: Event Types
parameters.name: eventTypes
parameters.description: Select the multiple event types to return. You can choose from the following options: Default, Focus Time, Out of Office, or Working Location.
parameters.tooltip: Select the multiple event types to return. You can choose from the following options: Default, Focus Time, Out of Office, or Working Location.

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.description: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified timestamp.

parameters.title: Created Before
parameters.description: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created before the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created before the specified timestamp.

parameters.title: Last Modification Time
parameters.description: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been last modified by the specified timestamp.
parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been last modified by the specified timestamp.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Specify the order of the events returned in the result from Google Calendar. Acceptable values are: startTime or updated.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the order of the events returned in the result from Google Calendar. Acceptable values are: startTime or updated.

parameters.title: Maximum Attendees
parameters.name: maxAttendees
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.

parameters.title: Maximum Results
parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of events returned on one result page. The number of events in the resulting page may be less than this value, or none at all, even if there are more events matching the query. By default the value is 250 entries. The page size can never be larger than 2500 events.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of events returned on one result page. The number of events in the resulting page may be less than this value, or none at all, even if there are more events matching the query. By default the value is 250 entries. The page size can never be larger than 2500 events.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.description: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_parameters
parameters.tooltip: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve events from Google Calendar.
parameters.description: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve events from Google Calendar.

operations.title: Get Event Details
operations.description: Retrieves an event details based on the calendar ID, event ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Calendar ID
parameters.name: calendar_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve event details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the calendar based on which you want to retrieve event details from Google Calendar. Note: If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.

parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the event whose details you want to retrieve from Google Calendar.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the event whose details you want to retrieve from Google Calendar.

parameters.title: Maximum Attendees
parameters.name: maxAttendees
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.

parameters.title: TimeZone
parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Specify the time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.
